Notes.Text:
This update for libtomcrypt fixes the following issue:

CVE-2019-17362: Fixed an improper detection of invalid UTF-8 sequences that could have led to DoS or information disclosure via crafted DER-encoded data (bsc#1153433).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In LibTomCrypt through 1.18.2, the der_decode_utf8_string function (in der_decode_utf8_string.c) does not properly detect certain invalid UTF-8 sequences. This allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) or read information from other memory locations via carefully crafted DER-encoded data.
